variants.text: We're looking for experienced professionals to serve as mentors and judges for our startup pitch contest at the {{event_name}}. Would you be interested in joining our panel?
Given your expertise in {{expertise_area}}, we'd be honored if you would consider serving as a mentor and judge at the {{event_name}} pitch contest.
We're assembling a distinguished panel of judges for our pitch contest and would love to have you contribute your insights and help identify the next generation of biotech innovators.
Do you know someone in your network who would be an excellent mentor and judge for early-stage biotech startups? We're looking for experienced professionals to help evaluate pitches at our event.
